Package net.sf.jguiraffe.gui.builder.action

Class ActionManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jguiraffe.gui.builder.action.ActionManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionManager
    public class ActionManagerImpl
extends Object
implements ActionManager

    A test implementation of the ActionManager interface.

    This implementation returns no functional objects wherever possible, but simple strings allowing test cases to exactly compare the results of method calls with expected values.

    Version:
    $Id: ActionManagerImpl.java 205 2012-01-29 18:29:57Z oheger $
    Author:
    Oliver Heger

        public FormAction createAction​(ActionBuilder actionBuilder,
                               ActionData actionData)
                        throws FormActionException
        Creates an action object. This implementation returns a FormActionImpl instance whose data property is set to a textual representation of the passed in parameters.
        Specified by:
        createAction in interface ActionManager
        Parameters:
        actionBuilder - the builder
        actionData - parameters for the new action
        Returns:
        the new action

                                          ActionData actionData,
                                          boolean checked,
                                          Object parent)
                                   throws FormActionException
        Creates a menu item based on the given action data. The return value will be a ComponentHandlerImpl object with a string representing the menu item as component.

        Parameters:

      • addMenuSeparator

        public void addMenuSeparator​(ActionBuilder actionBuilder,
                             Object menu)
                      throws FormActionException
        Adds a separator to a menu. This implementation expects the passed in menu object to be a Container. The separator is simply a text that is added to the container's text.
        Specified by:
        addMenuSeparator in interface ActionManager
        Parameters:
        actionBuilder - the action builder
        menu - the menu
        Throws:
        FormActionException - if an error occurs

      • addToolBarSeparator

        public void addToolBarSeparator​(ActionBuilder actionBuilder,
                                Object toolBar)
                         throws FormActionException
        Adds a separator to a tool bar. This is basically the same as addMenuSeparator().
        Specified by:
        addToolBarSeparator in interface ActionManager
        Parameters:
        actionBuilder - the action builder
        toolBar - the tool bar
        Throws:
        FormActionException - if an error occurs

      • registerPopupMenuHandler

        public void registerPopupMenuHandler​(Object component,
                                     PopupMenuHandler handler,
                                     ComponentBuilderData compData)
                              throws FormActionException
        Registers a handler for a context menu at a component. This implementation checks whether the component is a Container. If this is the case, a text will be added to the container. Otherwise no action is performed.
        Specified by:
        registerPopupMenuHandler in interface ActionManager
        Parameters:
        component - the component
        handler - the handler
        compData - the component builder data object
        Throws:
        FormActionException - if an error occurs

                                      ComponentBuilderData compData)
        Builds a string referring to the specified handler object.
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler
        compData - the component builder data object
        Returns:
        a string referring to this handler
